title: Getting started
text: Welcome the summer Data Science Practicum at Gordon College! This website provides information and resources related to the lecture portion of the practicum.

title: Getting started
text:
Syllabus

Learning outcomes
At the end of the lecture portion of the practicum, students will be able to:

Identify all steps in the general data science workflow, and describe the utility of each step using examples.
Apply the six fundamental transformation verbs (used in the {dplyr} API) to perform wrangling tasks.




Lecture schedule
The lecture schedule for summer 2023. Morning sessions run from 9:00am to 12:00pm, and afternoon sessions from 1:00pm to 4:00pm
